member.name: UNIVERSAL_NAME_INFOA
member.summary: The UNIVERSAL_NAME_INFO structure contains information about the UNC form of a universal name. It is used by the function.

member.name: UNIVERSAL_NAME_INFOA.lpUniversalName
member.summary: If the provider supports a universal name, it will return that here.
